short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Places for SuperOffice enables you to search places and auto-fill company details.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
THE POWER OF GOOGLE DIRECTLY INTEGRATED IN YOUR SUPEROFFICE CRM ENVIRONMENT

Places for SuperOffice features more than 200 million businesses that are updated frequently through owner-verified listings and user-moderated contributions. It uses Google Maps data to search for the company you are looking for.

Note that your SuperOffice Administrator will need to sign-up for Places for SuperOffice before you can use it. 

Requirements SuperOffice CRM:
· SuperOffice CRM Online subscription (all plans supported)
· All user plans are supported 
· Chrome Browser (Windows and Apple Mac supported)

Requirements SuperOffice CRM Onsite:
· SuperOffice CRM Web 8.1 R03 or newer
· Chrome Browser (Windows and Apple Mac supported)

Key features:
· Access more than 200 million business directly from SuperOffice.
· Address information updated frequently through owner-verified listings and user-moderated contributions
· Fully integrated on the SuperOffice company card
